1.1.1.2.14. shapepipe.modules.sextractor_runner module¶

SEXTRACTOR RUNNER

This module run SExtractor.

Author

Axel Guinot

shapepipe.modules.sextractor_runner.make_post_process(cat_path, f_wcs_path, pos_params, ccd_size)[source]¶

Make post process

This function will add one hdu by epoch to the SExtractor catalog. Only works for tiles. The columns will be : NUMBER same as SExtractor NUMBER

EXP_NAME name of the single exposure for this epoch CCD_N extansion where the object is

Parameters

  • cat_path (str) – Path to the outputed SExtractor catalog

  • f_wcs_path (str) – Path to the log file containing wcs for all single exp CCDs

  • pos_params (list) – World coordinates to use to match the objects.

  • ccd_size (list) – Size of a ccd [nx, ny]

shapepipe.modules.sextractor_runner.sextractor_runner(input_file_list, output_dir, file_number_string, config, w_log)[source]¶
